name: LubeLogger
description: Self-hosted, open-source, collaborative Vehicle Maintenance and Fuel Mileage Tracker.
short_desc: Vehicle Maintenance and Fuel Mileage Tracker.
author: hargata

form_fields.label: Locale and Language Settings
form_fields.hint: Affect how numbers, currencies, and dates are formatted.

form_fields.label: Allowed File Extensions
form_fields.hint: Allowed file extensions for document uploads, use '*' to allow all file types.

form_fields.label: Message of the Day
form_fields.hint: Message of The Day displayed in Login page if configured.

form_fields.label: Email > Server
form_fields.hint: Email SMTP settings used only for configuring multiple users(to send their registration token and forgot password tokens).

form_fields.label: Auth > Enable ?
form_fields.hint: Allows users to configure whether if authentication is enabled via environment variable.

form_fields.label: Auth > Username Hash
form_fields.hint: SHA256 Hash of the root username.

form_fields.label: Auth > Password Hash
form_fields.hint: SHA256 Hash of the root password.

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Name
form_fields.hint: Name of the OpenID Connect Provider

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Client ID
form_fields.hint: Client Id to Authenticate with the Provider

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Client Secret
form_fields.hint: Client Secret to Authenticate with the Provider

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Authorization URL
form_fields.hint: Authorization URL to the Provider's Login Page

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Token URL
form_fields.hint: URL to retrieve user JWT from the Provider

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Scope
form_fields.hint: The scope for retrieving the user's email claim(usually it's just 'email')

form_fields.label: Auth > OpenID > Validate State
form_fields.hint: true/false(default: false) - whether LubeLogger should validate state.
